item.title: About Me
item.description: Education University of the Arts London – MA Games Design 2019.10-2021.1

About Me I am Xinyuan. Someone who wishes to enjoy his life with doing something meaningful. Education Background MA Games Design | University of the Arts London | 2019–2021 BEng Industrial Design | University of Liverpool | 2015–2019 Internship and Work Experience I am waiting for you to hire me! However, I am not looking for a PhD position. Research Interest Interactive media Games Design Human Computer Interaction User Experience Affective Computing The things that interested me is how the interactive media can influence human being and how can we use them to support mankind to own a better life, or at least a little happier.
